About Me!

Hello everybody. I'm Zakuan, an awesome software and web developer from Malaysia who like to build great products.

I am a self-learner, self-motivated, optimistic and friendly person that possesses the right mix of positive image and attitude. An excellent problem solver with combined patience and determination in solving issues that I've encountered. Throughout the years, I've developed a good confident and adaptable with different kinds of people.

Hard work in meeting or exceeding the standard is satisfying to me as my passion for creating and enhancing anything that related to technology I've learned. I am an analytical person with strong systems skills and visually aware with an eye for design trends.

THE THINKING

Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old.
